import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Shop = () => { const cart = useSelector((state)=>state.cart) return (
{ cart.cartitems.map(e=>(
{/*

Languages English

*/}
{e.courseName}
{e.reyting}
{e.discount > 0 ? ( <> {e.price} $ {" "} {e.discount} $ ) : ( {e.price} $ )}
)) }
) } export default Shop
